text.section: There is an Advisory Board on Prescription Drug Monitoring in the Department.
The Secretary shall designate the chair of the Board.

section.section: The term of a member appointed by the Secretary is 3 years.
The terms of members appointed by the Secretary are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Board on October 1, 2011.
If a vacancy occurs during the term of an appointed member, the Secretary shall appoint a successor who shall serve until the term expires.

text.section:
A member of the Board:
May not receive compensation as a member of the Board; but
Is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

The Secretary and the Board shall consult with stakeholders and professionals knowledgeable about prescription drug monitoring programs as appropriate to obtain input and guidance about implementation of the Program.
